meanings.definition: The action of putting something back together after it has been taken apart.
meanings.sent1: The reassembly of the puzzle was challenging but satisfying.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic completed the reassembly of the engine with precision.
meanings.sent3: After the cat knocked over the vase, the reassembly process began.
meanings.sent4: The reassembly of the team after the conflict was a delicate task.
meanings.sent5: The reassembly of the broken toy brought a smile to the child's face.

meanings.definition: The process of reuniting parts or components to form a whole again.
meanings.sent1: The reassembly of the scattered pieces was like solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent2: The reassembly of the team after the game was crucial for their success.
meanings.sent3: The reassembly of the lost documents was a race against time.
meanings.sent4: The reassembly of the ingredients created a delicious dish.
meanings.sent5: The reassembly of the old clock made it tick again.
